attributes.additional_details: Car crime & robbery offences are a drastic problem within Hampshire & although police can attend a majority, they simply don't have the resources to deal with it all. They are over worked & fed up of the backlash from local communities that 'nothing is being done'
attributes.background: Budgets have been so severely cut in all Police forces that they are no longer able to Police efficiently. They need more officers to be able to respond to local crime & public demand.
